Establish a connection with a data recorder to review telemetry data in real-time!
Only Tacview Advanced can record real-time telemetry.
A password may be required to join a private session
Failed to connect real-time telemetry to given host address.
Real-time telemetry not compatible with the host exporter.
Playback is currently not synchronized with real-time telemetry.
Import Falcon 4 *.flt files to review telemetry data in real-time!

As soon as your Falcon 4 flight has started, press the [F] key to start recording data. Falcon will generate *.flt files which will be read by Tacview and displayed in real-time in the 3D view.
*** NOTES ***
• You might want to force Falcon to inject colors and callsigns by pressing twice the [F] key during the flight. • Starting with BMS 4.36 Update 1, you need to set g_bTacviewAcmi 0 in "Falcon BMS User.cfg" file to create *.flt files.
Please select the Acmi folder where Falcon 4.0 stores its VHS And FLT files.
Listens to 1090MHz ADS-B radio signals to display aircraft around you in real-time!

Cannot find any supported USB radio device to read ADS-B signal. Check https://www.rtl-sdr.com for a list of RTL2832U compatible radio equipment, and make sure WinUSB is properly installed from https://zadig.akeo.ie

To record ADS-B radio signal in real-time, you need:
• RTL2832U compatible USB radio dongle (https://www.rtl-sdr.com) • 1090MHz antenna • 1090MHz ADS-B filter (optional) • WinUSB drivers for your dongle (https://zadig.akeo.ie)
Make sure everything is properly connected to your computer and configured, then click connect!

When this icon is visible, all flights are automatically recorded by your flight simulator. It is not necessary to keep Tacview running while you are flying.

Please read the following license agreement carefully. You must scroll down to its end to continue.
To register your product and unlock advanced features, enter the 25-character key you have received by email. If you do not have a product key yet, you can buy a new one.
If you already own a product key, enter it here. Otherwise, use the link below to purchase an upgrade.

To upgrade your product and unlock advanced features, enter the 25-character Tacview Advanced key you have received by email. If you do not have a Tacview Advanced product key yet, you can buy a new one.
If you already own a Tacview Advanced product key, enter it here. Otherwise, use the link below to purchase an upgrade.
Buy a new product key online
This product key is not valid. Please check the key and try again.

Your copy is now registered. Keep your product key in a safe place in case you ever need to reinstall your Tacview.
In addition to many exclusive advanced features, you now have priority technical support as well as privileged access to updates and previews of future versions of Tacview 2.x.
Learn more about the advantages of using a registered copy of Tacview
To use this feature or version of Tacview you need to upgrade your license.
To use this feature or version of Tacview you need a Tacview Advanced license.

File '{1}' not found.¤Please ensure that the given flight recording is accessible and available.
'{1}' is an invalid file name.¤Please retry with a well formatted or a simplier file name.
Invalid file format.¤'{1}' is not a flight recording or it is not well formatted.
Invalid file.¤'{1}' seems to have been corrupted.
Out of memory.¤Try to close some applications then retry.¤(This flight recording may also be too huge.)
The file format of '{1}' is not supported.¤Check the official website to know if there is a newer version of Tacview or another edition which can read this file.
Invalid file format.¤One required parameter is missing.
Invalid file format.¤Some parameters are invalid.
Unsupported file format.¤'{1}' may be created with a newer version of Tacview.
Invalid file format.¤One unit is still referenced after having left the area.

Invalid path.¤Please ensure that the given flight recording '{1}' is accessible and available.
Invalid file name.¤Please retry with a well formatted or a simplier file name.

Disk full.¤Remove some files then retry.
Sharing Violation.¤Ensure that this file is not already in use by another application.
